tool_description: Processes multiple digital items simultaneously for cataloging, applying consistent metadata extraction, classification, and record generation workflows to large collections.

item_list.description: Array of file paths or identifiers for items to be cataloged

workflow_template.description: Predefined workflow: basic, standard, comprehensive, or custom

output_format.description: Desired output format: MARC, Dublin Core, MODS, or mixed

parallel_processing.description: Whether to process items concurrently for faster completion

error_handling.description: Error handling strategy: skip, log, or stop

quality_threshold.description: Minimum quality score for record acceptance (0.1-1.0)

progress_reporting.description: Whether to provide progress updates during processing

collection_identifier.description: Identifier for the collection being processed

institutional_code.description: Institution code for cataloging source attribution

custom_fields.description: Additional custom fields to include in all records

batch_size.description: Number of items to process in each batch (1-100)

error_messages: Empty item list: Provide at least 2 items for batch processing
Invalid workflow template: Use basic, standard, comprehensive, or custom
Unsupported output format: Use MARC, Dublin Core, MODS, or mixed
Invalid error handling option: Use skip, log, or stop
Quality threshold out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Batch size exceeded: Maximum 100 items per batch, use multiple batches for larger collections
Invalid batch size: Batch size must be between 1 and 100
Processing failed: Critical error in batch processing workflow
Access denied: Insufficient permissions for one or more items in the batch
usage: Provide item_list array with file paths and workflow_template for processing approach. Configure output_format, enable parallel_processing for speed, set error_handling strategy, and specify quality_threshold for acceptance criteria. Use collection_identifier and institutional_code for batch attribution.

total_processed.description: Total number of items successfully processed

successful_records.description: Number of records meeting quality threshold

failed_items.description: Number of items that failed processing

output_files.description: Array of generated output file paths

error_log.description: Array of error messages and failed item details

quality_statistics.description: Array of quality scores for successfully processed items
